column5: Beautiful 3 Bedroom townhouse less than 1.5 Miles from Campus. Just under 2,000 sq. ft. in a quiet neighborhood with a neighborhood pool. Only half a mile to the George Bush Presidential Library, creeks, and walking trails. Split floor plan with master bedroom downstairs. 2 spacious bedrooms upstairs with en suite bathrooms. Living room, fully furnished kitchen, dining room, large TV and Wifi, and washer/dryer. This townhouse provides much more comfort and space than a hotel room.
